Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add authentication improvements and session isolation

- Add password confirmation field on registration with validation
- Enable Enter key submission for login and registration forms
- Implement tab-based session isolation for multiple simultaneous logins
- Add CLAUDE.md with project context and guidelines

Session isolation allows multiple users to log in from different tabs/windows
on the same computer without sessions interfering with each other. Each tab
gets a unique ID stored in sessionStorage, and the server maintains separate
session data per tab.
EOF
\)")
